CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Preferred_Language__c), 'English', 'Regarding Eurostar Case: ' + CaseNumber , 'French', 'Concernant votre dossier Eurostar: ' + CaseNumber , 'German', 'Ihre Eurostar Vorgangsnummer: ' + CaseNumber , 'Dutch', 'Betreffende Eurostar: ' + CaseNumber , 'Regarding Eurostar Case: + CaseNumber')
CustomField.label: Text Body Email Subject
